text.p: ACI Telecentrics Inc said Thursday it closed its initial public offering of 1,400,000 shares of its common stock priced at $5.00 a share.
The stock, which began trading October 21, traded up 3/8 at 6-1/8 in the mid-afternoon Thursday.
The offering was underwritten by Miller, Johnson & Kuehn, Inc.
The company now has 5,600,000 shares outstanding. Prior to the initial public offering, shares in the company were held by two principals of the firm.
Miller, Johnson & Kuehn indicated that it expects to exercise its overallotment option for the purchase of an additional 210,000 shares by November 20, the company added.
ACI provides outbound teleservices, primarily to corporations in the financial services, publishing, and telecommunications industries, operating five call centers throughout the Midwest.
